### Describe the bug

Cythonizing certain code containing an extra double-quote in a class docstring causes Cython to hang while consuming ever increasing memory.

Ctrl-Cing the process prints a traceback within `strip_string_literals`: https://github.com/cython/cython/blob/c7dae70222b36f52945e9723acf72d2bd698b08d/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py#L349

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/.venv/bin/cythonize", line 10, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
             ~~~~^^
  File "/home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/Cython/Build/Cythonize.py", line 251, in main
    _cython_compile_files(all_paths, options)
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/Cython/Build/Cythonize.py", line 67, in _cython_compile_files
    ext_modules = cythonize(
        paths,
    ...<8 lines>...
        language=options.language,
        **options.options)
  File "/home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 1010, in cythonize
    module_list, module_metadata = create_extension_list(
                                   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^
        module_list,
        ^^^^^^^^^^^^
    ...<4 lines>...
        language=language,
        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
        aliases=aliases)
        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 859, in create_extension_list
    kwds = deps.distutils_info(file, aliases, base).values
           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 707, in distutils_info
    return (self.transitive_merge(filename, self.distutils_info0, DistutilsInfo.merge)
            ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 716, in transitive_merge
    return self.transitive_merge_helper(
           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^
        node, extract, merge, seen, {}, self.cimported_files)[0]
        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 722, in transitive_merge_helper
    deps = extract(node)
  File "/home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 685, in distutils_info0
    info = self.parse_dependencies(filename)[3]
           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 546, in parse_dependencies
    return parse_dependencies(source_filename)
  File "Cython/Utils.py", line 90, in Cython.Utils.cached_function.wrapper
  File "/home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 509, in parse_dependencies
    source, literals = strip_string_literals(source)
                       ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 349, in strip_string_literals
    while True:
          ^^^^
KeyboardInterrupt
```

This is with Cython 3.0.12 but I notice this function has changed in `master`.

### Code to reproduce the behaviour:

The problem code is this (note the extra trailing quote):

```cython
class RadiansWarning(Warning):
    """A warning about the use of radians.""""
```

This is not a reproducer, however, and I was unable to minimise this - attempts to do so caused Cython to fail to parse the code.

The full file that hangs is this one: https://github.com/lordmauve/wasabi-geom/blob/49b470573c02b7ebed9e3e5064dd11a2d61a6563/wasabigeom.pyx

### Expected behaviour

Expected behaviour is to fail to parse:

```
[1/1] Cythonizing /home/mauve/dev/wasabi-geom/radians.pyx

Error compiling Cython file:
------------------------------------------------------------
...
this message globally.\
"""


class RadiansWarning(Warning):
    """A warning about the use of radians.""""
                                              ^
------------------------------------------------------------

radians.pyx:17:46: Unclosed string literal
```

### OS

Linux

### Python version

3.13.1

### Cython version

3.0.12

### Additional context

_No response_

comment_data.body:
Thanks. As you noted, this function was completely rewritten in the master (3.1) branch:
https://github.com/cython/cython/issues/5977
https://github.com/cython/cython/commit/a8a2d41d7799b485b829bb95c36b4dacbeba5173

The changes are substantial (and for good reason), so I'd rather not try a simple backport of this to the maintenance 3.0.x branch.

I'm aware that this opens a path to DoS attacks, but would consider the risk low. Few people translate source code from untrusted sources. And I don't see much risk of this being exploited in any other way than a simple DoS. Cython's  `DEF` constant handling might be able to achieve the same "goal" in user provided source code.

We're about to release 3.1b1 soon, which resolves this and similar issues completely. I propose to close this ticket as a "won't fix" in 3.0.

title: [BUG] Hang with increasing memory use due to extra double quote
